info.title: Microsoft Cognitive Language Service
info.description: The language service API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills built with best-in-class Microsoft machine learning algorithms. The API can be used to analyze unstructured text for tasks such as sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, language detection and question answering. Further documentation can be found in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/language-service/overview.

get.description: Lists the existing projects.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The number of projects to be returned.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: The maximum number of projects per page.

get.description: Gets the details of a project.

patch.description: Creates a new project or updates an existing one.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

post.description: Triggers a job to export a project's data.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the exported project file to use.

values.name: Conversation
values.description: Specifies the format for a conversational project.

values.name: Luis
values.description: Specifies the format for an application that was exported from LUIS.

parameters.name: stringIndexType
parameters.description:
Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional
information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description:
The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this
option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for
example Java, JavaScript.

parameters.name: trainedModelLabel
parameters.description:
Trained model label to export. If the trainedModelLabel is null, the default
behavior is to export the current working copy.

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

post.description:
Triggers a job to import a project. If a project with the same name already
exists, the data of that project is replaced.

get.description: Lists the supported languages for the given project type.

values.name: Conversation
values.description: A project to build natural language into apps, bots, and IoT devices.

values.name: Orchestration
values.description:
A project to connect and orchestrate Conversation, Custom question answering
and LUIS projects together in one single project.

values.name: CustomConversationSummarization
values.description:
A project to build conversation summarization models which are able to
summarize long conversations.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The number of languages to be returned.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: The maximum number of languages per page.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description:
Lists the supported prebuilt entities that can be used while creating composed
entities.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
The language to get supported prebuilt entities for. Required if multilingual
is false. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example, use "en"
for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

parameters.name: multilingual
parameters.description:
Whether to get the support prebuilt entities for multilingual or monolingual
projects. If true, the language parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The number of prebuilt entities to be returned.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: The maximum number of prebuilt entities per page.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Gets the result of an export job.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

values.name: returnLongestOverlap
values.description:
When two or more components are found in the text and overlap, the component
with the longest set of characters is returned.

values.name: requireExactOverlap
values.description:
All components must overlap at the exact same characters in the text for the
entity to return. If one of the defined components is not matched or predicted,
the entity will not return.

values.name: separateComponents
values.description:
Every component's match or prediction is returned as a separate instance of the
entity.

values.name: combineComponents
values.description:
When two or more components are found in the text and overlap, the components'
spans are merged together into one span combining all of them.

ConfusionMatrix.description: Represents a confusion matrix for evaluating predictions against labeled data.

ConfusionMatrixCell.description: Represents a cell in a confusion matrix.

ConfusionMatrixRow.description: Represents a row in the confusion matrix.

ConversationExportedEntity.description: Represents an entity with its components.

compositionSetting.description: The behavior to follow when the entity's components overlap with each other.

list.description: The list component of the entity.

regex.description: The regex component of the entity.

requiredComponents.description: The required components. Allowed values are 'learned', 'list', 'prebuilts' and 'regex'.

ConversationExportedIntent.description: Represents an exported intent of a conversational project.

ConversationExportedUtterance.description: Represents an exported utterance for a conversational project.

entities.description: Represents the entity labels of the utterance.

language.description:
Represents the utterance's language. This is BCP-47 representation of a
language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for
Spanish etc.

dataset.description: The dataset for this utterance. Allowed values are 'Train' and 'Test'.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringConversat.description: Represents the exported assets of a conversational project.

intents.description: The intents defined in the project.

entities.description: The entities defined in the project.

utterances.description: The utterances defined in the project.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringCreateDep.description: Represents the options for creating or updating a project deployment.

assignedResourceIds.description:
Represents the resource IDs to be assigned to the deployment.
If provided, the deployment will be rolled out to the resources
provided here as well as the original resource in which the project is created.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringCreatePro.description: Represents the options used to create or update a project.

storageInputContainerName.description: The storage container name in case of conversation summarization.

multilingual.description: Whether the project would be used for multiple languages or not.

language.description:
The project language. This is BCP-47 representation of a language. For example,
use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for Spanish etc.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringDeleteDep.description: Represents the options for deleting a project deployment.

assignedResourceIds.description:
Represents the resource IDs to delete the deployment from.
If not provided, the deployment will be rolled out from all the
resources it is deployed to.
If provided, it will delete the deployment only from the specified
assigned resources, and leave it for the rest.

values.name: percentage
values.description:
Split the data into training and test sets according to user-defined
percentages.

values.name: manual
values.description: Split the data according to the chosen dataset for every example in the data.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringEvaluatio.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

kind.description:
Represents the evaluation kind. By default, the evaluation kind is set to
percentage.

trainingSplitPercentage.description:
Represents the training dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the
evaluation kind is percentage.

testingSplitPercentage.description:
Represents the testing dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the
evaluation kind is percentage.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringExportedC.description: Defines the orchestration details for a Conversational project target.

projectName.description: The name of the targeted project.

deploymentName.description: The name of the targeted deployment.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringExportedC.description: Represents the orchestration options for a Conversational project target.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringExportedL.description: Defines the orchestration details for a LUIS application target.
Represents the orchestration options for a LUIS application target.

projectFileVersion.description: The version of the exported file.

stringIndexType.description:
Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets. For additional
information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringExportedP.description: Represents the assets of an exported project.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringExportedQ.description: Defines the orchestration details for a Question Answering project target.

projectName.description: The name of the target project.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringExportedQ.description: Represents the orchestration options for a Question Answering project target.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringOrchestra.description: Represents the assets of an orchestration project.

intents.description: Represents the intents of the project.

utterances.description: Represents the utterances of the project.

values.name: Conversation
values.description: A project to build natural language into apps, bots, and IoT devices.

values.name: Orchestration
values.description:
A project to connect and orchestrate Conversation, Custom question answering
and LUIS projects together in one single project.

values.name: CustomConversationSummarization
values.description:
A project to build conversation summarization models which are able to
summarize long conversations.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringProjectSe.description: Represents the settings used to define the project behavior.

confidenceThreshold.description:
The threshold of the intent with the highest confidence, at which the
prediction will automatically be changed to "None". The value of the threshold
should be between 0 and 1 inclusive.

normalizeCasing.description: Gets or sets normalize casing flag

augmentDiacritics.description: Gets or sets the augment diacritics flag.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringProjectSe.description: Represents the settings used to define the project behavior.

confidenceThreshold.description:
The threshold of the intent with the highest confidence, at which the
prediction will automatically be changed to "None". The value of the threshold
should be between 0 and 1 inclusive.

normalizeCasing.description: Gets or sets normalize casing flag

augmentDiacritics.description: Gets or sets the augment diacritics flag.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description:
The offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this
option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for
example Java, JavaScript.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringSwapDeplo.description: Represents the options for swapping two deployments together.

ConversationalAnalysisAuthoringTrainingJ.description: Represents the options for starting a new training job.

trainingConfigVersion.description:
Represents training config version. By default, "latest" value is used which
uses the latest released training config version.

trainingMode.description: Represents the mode of the training operation.

evaluationOptions.description:
Represents the evaluation options. By default, the evaluation kind is
percentage, with training split percentage as 80, and testing split percentage
as 20.

values.name: advanced
values.description:
Trains using fine-tuned neural network transformer models. Can train
multilingual projects.

values.name: standard
values.description: Faster training times for quicker iterations.

DeploymentJobState.description: Represents the state of a deployment job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

DeploymentResource.description: Represents an Azure resource assigned to a deployment.

EntitiesEvaluationSummary.description: Represents the evaluation result summary for the project's entities.

confusionMatrix.description:
Represents the confusion matrix between two entities (the two entities can be
the same). The matrix is between the entity that was labelled and the entity
that was predicted.

microF1.description: Represents the micro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

microPrecision.description:
Represents the micro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1
inclusive.

microRecall.description:
Represents the micro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1
inclusive.

macroF1.description: Represents the macro F1. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1 inclusive.

macroPrecision.description:
Represents the macro precision. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1
inclusive.

macroRecall.description:
Represents the macro recall. Expected value is a float between 0 and 1
inclusive.

EntityEvaluationSummary.description: Represents the evaluation result for an entity.

truePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of true positive

trueNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of true negative

falsePositiveCount.description: Represents the count of false positive

falseNegativeCount.description: Represents the count of false negative

Error.description: Represents the definition of an error that occurred.

target.description: The target that caused the error, if applicable.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

error.description: Represents the definition of an error that occurred.

evaluationOptions.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

EvaluationJobState.description: Represents the state of a evaluation job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

errors.description: The errors encountered while executing the job.

EvaluationOnDemandOptions.description: Represents the options used running the evaluation.

kind.description:
Represents the evaluation kind. By default, the evaluation kind is set to
percentage.

testingSplitPercentage.description:
Represents the testing dataset split percentage. Only needed in case the
evaluation kind is percentage.

EvaluationResults.description: Represent a list of utterances' evaluation results.

entitiesEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to entities evaluation.

intentsEvaluation.description: Contains the data related to intents evaluation.

evaluationOptions.description: The options that were used while running the evaluation.

ExportProjectJobState.description: Represents the state of an export job.

createdDateTime.description: The creation date time of the job.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The last date time the job was updated.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration date time of the job.

warnings.description: The warnings that were encountered while executing the job.

resultUrl.description: The URL to use in order to download the exported project.

ExportedEntityList.description: Represents a list component of an entity.

sublists.description: The sub-lists of the list component.

ExportedEntityListSynonym.description: Represents a list of synonyms inside a list component

language.description:
Represents the language of the synonyms. This is BCP-47 representation of a
language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK), "es" for
Spanish etc.

values.description: The list of synonyms.

ExportedEntityRegex.description: Represents a regex component of an entity.

expressions.description:
The regex expressions of the regex component. These expressions follow the .NET
regex syntax. For reference, check here:
https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/standard/base-types/regular-expressions

ExportedEntityRegexExpression.description:
Represents a regex expression inside a regex component. This expression follows
the .NET regex syntax. For reference, check here:
https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/standard/base-types/regular-expressions

regexKey.description: The key of the regex expression.

language.description:
Represents the language of the regex expression. This is BCP-47 representation
of a language. For example, use "en" for English, "en-gb" for English (UK),
"es" for Spanish etc.

ExportedEntitySublist.description: Represents a sub-list inside a list component.

synonyms.description: The phrases of that correspond to the sub-list.

ExportedOrchestrationOptions.description: Represents the options used to define the orchestration behavior of an intent.

ExportedPrebuiltEntity.description: Represents an exported prebuilt entity component

ExportedUtteranceEntityLabel.description: Represents an entity label for an utterance.

category.description: The category of the entity label.

offset.description: Start position for the entity text.

Represents the confusion matrix between two intents (the two intents can be the

etc.
